actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide hospital and medical care to persons who served in the Local Security Patrol Force of Guam during World War II.

summary.text: Authorizes hospital and medical care to those persons who served in the Local Security Patrol Force of Guam during World War II.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide hospital and medical care to persons who served in the Local Security Patrol Force of Guam during World War II.
